verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: potatoes] with spring onions i love the simplicity of this recipe as well as the ease of preparation with my slow cooker and everyone always likes roasted potatoes even my pickiest child if desired top with shredded or crumbled cheese —theresa gomez stuart florida
